description: Allows the dragon to go out with glory. This controls the Ender Dragon's death animation.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Dragondeath Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the dragon to go out with glory. This controls the Ender Dragon's death animation and can't be used by other mobs.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
